name: Scout the Robot 2.0
description:
This is a remake of a game that I made using SFML in first year of university however this time using Unity.

Description

Play as Scout the robot to collect all the cogs to rebuild his long lost friend Rover. Navigate through the levels collection the cogs along the way and reaching the flag at the end.

Controls

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

L Shift - Sprint

ESC - Pause
